item.description:
The Regal Cinema in Westboro is showing Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince at 4:10 on Sunday. This is the cinema near Route 9 and Highway 135. Let's plan on meeting at 3:50. Anyone who want can come to dinner after the show.

If you need to reach me, my cell phone number is 508-981-0455.

- David
item.how_to_find_us: I'm the guy with glasses, goatee, and Superman cap

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Harry Potter - Sunday at 4:10 PM in Westboro
